tidbits.title: Founded by Freed Slaves
tidbits.description: Liberia was founded by freed American slaves in the 19th century, and its flag and constitution were inspired by the United States.

tidbits.title: Natural Beauty
tidbits.description: The country offers natural beauty with lush rainforests, diverse wildlife in national parks, and stunning coastal areas along the Atlantic Ocean.

tidbits.title: Challenges and Progress
tidbits.description: Liberia has faced challenges including civil wars but has made strides in recovery, striving for stability, and fostering economic development.
